name: Rebirth Konan
description:
Made for the Indie Game Making Contest: Rebirth

Born July 29, Released August 5.

Game Story

A retired cop, a middle-aged man known as Konan, the live without a passion for inquiry into things, just leaving him with a fairly intelligent mind. On Christmas Eve, a man who suddenly appears at a bar will change Konan fate, returning to the time when Konan's youth as a policeman, re-examining the first murder he took on with his current eyes, searching for the truth of the incident and finding a way out of this cycle of reincarnation.Maybe this what mind “Rebirth” , for Konan.

Game Project

The game is incomplete. At present, it takes only half an hour. If many people like this game, I believe I will continue to complete it until I am satisfied with the final product. There may be some bugs in the current playable content of the game. If found, I hope you can actively put forward. In addition, English is not my mother tongue, so there may be some problems in the text.

For future plans, more explorable content and interactive items will be added, and the existing story of the work will be improved, which is expected to be completed before August 22

（I'll try to update as soon as possible, but I'm going to sleep first, I haven't slept for three days.） How to play

Just like the other game what you have to play. ( nonsense)
